sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO consume_type (creator, gmt_created, modifier, gmt_modified, is_deleted, consume_type, login_id) VALUES (#creator#, now(), #modifier#, now(), 'no', #consumeType#, #loginId#)
sqlMap.select: select consume_type_id as consumeTypeId, creator as creator, gmt_created as gmtCreated, modifier as modifier, gmt_modified as gmtModified, is_deleted as isDeleted, consume_type as consumeType, login_id as loginId from consume_type where login_id = #loginId# and is_deleted='no' order by gmt_created asc

select consume_type_id as consumeTypeId, creator as creator, gmt_created as gmtCreated, modifier as modifier, gmt_modified as gmtModified, is_deleted as isDeleted, consume_type as consumeType, login_id as loginId from consume_type where consume_type_id = #consumeTypeId# and is_deleted='no'
sqlMap.update: update consume_type set modifier = #modifier#, gmt_modified = now(), consume_type = #consumeType# where consume_type_id = #consumeTypeId# and is_deleted = 'no'
